comments.text: The `NeedsFunctionEnvironmentObjects` script flag can be computed in the parser for both lazy and non-lazy scripts if we use the `ParseContext::Scope` binding data.
comments.author: tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: The `NeedsFunctionEnvironmentObjects` script flag can be computed in the parser for both lazy and non-lazy scripts if we use the `ParseContext::Scope` binding data.
comments.creator: tcampbell@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 9142226
Bug 1631997 - Remove the MarkAllBindingsClosedOver mechanism


This is no longer needed now that legacy generators are not supported and we
know that a function is async/generator from the start.
comments.author: tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
This is no longer needed now that legacy generators are not supported and we
know that a function is async/generator from the start.
comments.creator: tcampbell@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 9142227
Bug 1631997 - Compute NeedsFunctionEnvironmentObjects flag in Parser


This computes the NeedsFunctionEnvironmentObjects flag in Parser by computing
the equivilent to the needsCallObject and needsNamedLambdaEnvironment
conditions using the parse-scope data.

Depends on D71857
comments.author: tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.creator: tcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:

comments.text:
Created attachment 9142377
Bug 1631997 - Cleanup computation of FunctionHasExtraBodyVarScope


Be more consistent with the previous patch and tighten asserts.

Depends on D71858
comments.raw_text:
